arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Borussia Dortmund Prediction: Can Vincent Kompany’s Side Extend Perfect Start in Klassiker?
arts.sum: We look ahead to Saturday's Bundesliga game at the Allianz Arena with our Bayern Munich vs Borussia Dortmund prediction and preview. Vincent Kompany’s side are looking to make it seven wins from seven against their unbeaten visitors. The post Bayern Munich vs Borussia Dortmund Prediction: Can Vincent Kompany’s Side Extend Perfect Start in Klassiker? appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich make enquiry for Dortmund defender Nico Schlotterbeck
arts.sum:
Sky Germany's Florian Plettenberg reports that Bayern have made an enquiry for Dortmund defender Nico Schlotterbeck. The 25-year-old is yet to extend his contract with BVB, putting Bayern on alert.

Meanwhile, Plettenberg has shut down rumours circulating that Liverpool are interested in the Germany international.
